songs.embed_content: Read “One Sign” by Galleon on Genius
songs.title: One Sign
songs.lyrics:
One sign
At the back of beyond for your eyes
I'll give you my heart and my mind
But I don't wanna waste our time
Oooh

One sign
If you want I can work all the time
Cause I know we could live in the sky
If you let me stay by your side
Oooh

Oooh
One sign
At the back of beyond for your eyes
I'll give you my heart and my mind
But I don't wanna waste our time
Oooh

One sign
If you want I can work all the time
Cause I know we could live in the sky
If you let me stay by your side
Oooh

Oooh (x3)

One sign
At the back of beyond for your eyes
I'll give you my heart and my mind
But I don't wanna waste our time
Oooh

Oooh (x3)

songs.embed_content: Read “I Believe” by Galleon on Genius
songs.title: I Believe
songs.lyrics:
When your dreams run away
And the shadows in your head (shadows in your head)
And the silence comes and stays
All the plans you can make

No matter what they gonna say
Cause I know who you are
Together in the same way
That's all I wanna share

Live, when I hear this sound
I believe in love

When your dreams run away
And the shadows in your head
And the silence comes and stays
All the plans you can make

No matter what they gonna say
Cause I know who you are
Together in the same way
That's all I wanna share

Live, when I hear this sound
I believe in love

album.full_title: At This Moment of Time by Galleon
album.name: At This Moment of Time

songs.lyrics:
Just an ordinary cat
With an ordinary life
And a sence of importance
Exhibitions and commercials
And powder cream

Just an ordinary brat
With extremly dirty hands
And a very dirty mind
He seduced her with a fish and with very gently
Hands

She was in for a surprice
The brat by her side was really a mouse
She had to escape
Cause rats keep looking for cats to rape

On a sunny afternoon in the ordinary world
She was finding out how life could be
On a sunny afternoon in the ordinary world
She found out it is very scary to be free
In the ordinary world on a sunny afternoon
He was chasing a dream
In the ordinary world on a sunny afternoon
No one is just who they seem

And now to something quiet different
When you forget to pay the rent
You find yourself on the street all alone
And none of your friends are at home
You feel like you're twelve inches tall
You bang your head to the wall
Everyone tells you're wrong
And now we get back to the song.......

Just an ordinary day , the sun was shining
Bright
And dogs were barking loud
She was catched by a mouse
And kicked by a girl

She was in for a surprice
The brat by her side was really a mouse
She had to escape
Cause rats keep looking for cats to rape

On a sunny afternoon in the ordinary world
She was finding out how life could be
On a sunny afternoon in the ordinary world
She found out it is very scary to be free
In the ordinary world on a sunny afternoon
He was chasing a dream
In the ordinary world on a sunny afternoon
No one is just who they seem

On a sunny afternoon in the ordinary world
She was finding out how life could be
On a sunny afternoon in the ordinary world
She found out it is very scary to be free
In the ordinary world on a sunny afternoon
He was chasing a dream
In the ordinary world on a sunny afternoon
No one is just who they seem

description.plain:
Miss Cypra and Galleon want to go back to the day.

Ironically, Young SKOOL eventually disbanded in 2004.

songs.title: Lights

songs.embed_content: Read “Freestyle” by Galleon on Genius
songs.title: Freestyle
songs.lyrics:
[Hook - Galleon]
Yeah I am rocking up your noggin
I don't know how much I am hogging
Man, these n*gger p*ssies live inside the miles
But that doesn't mean they don't have no Freestyle

[Verse 1 - Galleon]
Catch me now, catch me in
All I ever do is win
Time to slip inside the bar
I'm the world's best by far
Everybody thinks ahead
Even when they sleep in bed
How do I acomplish fame
I just need to play the game
Life is a darting gun coming at you
Don't hide behind a wall, it will just go through
I got new people, Young Cuts alive
Wasting your time

[Hook]

[Verse 2 - Nicki Minaj]
Y'all got to realise I am new to the game
Even though I know it will always be the same
Only new artists get an extra fill
So if you're old, you'll receive no will
When my album drops the beat goes mad
Even if you're far away you will be glad
Snap the photos, don't wanna be in mags
But Inwill always know

[Hook]

[Verse 3 - Defusion]
Wrath is right, peace is wrong
That's the label, this the song
Take it easy, I go by
Ignore me, couldn't give it a try
All-Star remix, hear me now
I'm not famous, don't know how
Found the king, broke his crown
Whatcha gonna do now?

[Hook]
